title: Speed, risk and the future of national security space
summary: Panel discussion at the Spacepower conference exploring how commercial space capabilities are reshaping national security, civil space, and military decision-making. The conversation includes perspectives from CEOs of SkyFi, Intuitive Machines, and Advanced Space on speed, dual-use technologies, and acquisition reform. ICEYE is mentioned as an example of commercial Earth observation capabilities but no concrete deal or event is described.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: contextual example of commercial Earth observation capabilities

entities.name: Innoflight
entities.involvement: contextual example of space avionics supplier
